sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom/client'

import App from './App'

ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <App counter={counter} />
)

let counter = 1

const refresh = () => {
  ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
    <App counter={counter} />
  )
}

refresh()
counter += 1
refresh()
counter += 1
refresh()

setInterval(() => {
  refresh()
  counter += 1
}, 1000)
